dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue:
Data provide geographic codes (State, county, place) for mailing addresses or physical location addresses based on zip code and post office name. SMSA codes are provided where applicable. Alternate names and common variant spelling are also provided.

Entire United States.

The City Reference File was constructed over a span of several years and was tailored to meet the geographic requirements for tabulating 1972 Economic Census data.

fields.notesText: Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I;
